pullrequest.title: Add plane below mud in vrc task 2

content.raw: Looks good to me. The mud physics are quite reasonable and the robot can walk (failing after few steps with teleop). Laser scans look ok in the mud. Only little problem I see are cameras when the head of the robot is inside the mud, they are reporting sky view as it would be on a standard surface.
content.html: Looks good to me. The mud physics are quite reasonable and the robot can walk (failing after few steps with teleop). Laser scans look ok in the mud. Only little problem I see are cameras when the head of the robot is inside the mud, they are reporting sky view as it would be on a standard surface.
